page.title: 17MERSHAM HATCH ESTATE 3
page.content: The livestock consists of 450 Friesian dairy cows and 400 followers. Milk is the largest source of income.At Birch- holt Court we saw the computerised milking parlour where 12 cows are milk- ed by machine at one time. This happens twice a day. Each cow has a number,and this is fed into the computer so food is allocated. In Summer 12 litres of milk must be produced off grass before there is any extra food.After that it is 25grams of cattle cake per litre. It takes 7minutes to milk one cow, and about 2hours to milk the 120cows in this dairy.These cows are yielding 5250 litres a year,and the herd is producing about 8000litres a day. Science has eliminated the most serious diseases such as T.B.and brucellosis, and the warble fly has been eradicated as a result of thorough control.
